h3.a: LSC donates coloring, puzzle books to school district

div.p: LSC Communications donated coloring books and puzzle books to Mattoon Community Unit School District 2. The books were placed in meal deliveries to our younger students Monday. Kris Maleske, community service director, thanked Brian Hinton of LSC Communications for their generosity. “The books were an unexpected gift and they couldn’t have come at a better time with our students being at home,” said Maleske. . . .

h3.a: Families asked to complete survey for remote learning days

div.p:
Mattoon Community Unit School District 2 will begin remote learning days for students April 14.
Through an executive order, Gov. J.B. Pritzker called for remote learning days. Mattoon staff will have staff planning March 31-April 3. The district’s spring break is April 6-April 13. There will be no instruction during Spring Break.

h3.a: TumbleBookLibrary is now accessible to RES, WES families

div.p:
TumbleBookLibrary is now available for free for Arland D. Williams Jr. Elementary School and Riddle Elementary School students, said Peggy Burton, librarian, WES.
Williams and Riddle schools have subscriptions to the the TumbleBookLibrary and now our families can access it from their homes, said Burton.
Access is unlimited and free to use until Aug. 31, 2020.
